limitmodifier.condition: Only for Performance, Must use linked synthtrument
For climbing, jumping, running, or knockdown resist.
Only for making repairs, typing, dancing etc, Must be engaged
Only for Knockdown Test, Must be engaged
Only for Escape Artist and Grapple, Must be loosened
Only for test involving endurance, Must be tightened
Only for Sneaking, Must be loosened
Only for Stealth group, Must be in Pairs
Only when attacking with the legs
